title: Why live anywhere else when you can live at Park Place Northville?
posting_body: ['Park Place Northville', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1202 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1745 - $2001', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Welcome to Park Place of Northville, located in Northville, Michigan.', 'Start making your apartment dreams a reality when you lease one of our luxury apartments near Farmington Hills.', 'Residents can select their perfect rental from a variety of one and two bedroom apartment floor plans.', 'Our community offers apartments featuring stainless steel appliances, large picture windows, walk-in closets and more!', 'Check the availability on our floor plans and apply for your new home today.', 'Community Amenities', '❖ 24 Hour Fitness Gym', '❖ Business Center', '❖ Clubhouse', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Online Payments Available', '❖ On-Site Maintenance', '❖ Swimming Pool', '❖ Tennis Court', '❖ Volleyball Court', '❖ Wifi-Cafe', '❖ Center Sidewalks Throughout', '❖ Close to Downtown Northville', '❖ Concierge', '❖ House Plant Watering Service', '❖ Lush Landscaping', '❖ Luxury Building', '❖ Minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment', '❖ Package Receiving', '❖ Pets Allowed', '❖ Smoke-Free', 'Unit Features', '❖ Built-in Microwave', '❖ Cathedral Ceilings On Second Floor', '❖ Central Air', '❖ Deluxe and Premium Available (Select Units)', '❖ Frost Free Refrigerator', '❖ Lake Views (Select Units)', '❖ Private Entrances (Select Units)', '❖ Range', '❖ Stainless Steel Appliances', '❖ Walk-In Closets', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '43001 Northville Place Dr', 'Northville, MI 48167', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'We are extremely pet-friendly, however, dogs are only allowed in Buildings 1 through 10!', 'Also, we even have "While Away" pet care!', 'Pet rent is $30 per pet.', 'Lease Terms:', '4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Management Company:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F4D9A9AADA034D8']
